roleset.name: varied, having many features or forms

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that has many featurs/forms

example.name: both args
example.text: This substance, which [*] is manifold in its forms and protean in its transformations, has, in its state of living matter, one physiological name which has become familiar, that of protoplasm.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Why ? Because experts do n't agree with him on his kooky policy stands , which [*] are manifold :

roleset.note: MANIFOLD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from manifold.01-j)
